data.text:
Kelly McGillis is rumoured to have hooked up with Whitney Houston (1988).

About

Kelly McGillis is a 66 year old American Actress. Born Kelly Ann McGillis on 9th July, 1957 in Newport Beach, California, USA, she is famous for her starring roles as Rachel Lapp in the 1985 neo-noir dramatic crime thriller film Witness, Charlotte "Charlie" Blackwood in the 1986 action drama film Top Gun and Kathryn Murphy in the 1988 legal drama film The Accused in a career that spans 1976–present. Her zodiac sign is Cancer.

Kelly McGillis has been in 10 on-screen matchups, including Harrison Ford in Witness (1985), Jeff Daniels in The House on Carroll Street (1988), Alec Baldwin in Sweet Revenge (1984), Alexander Godunov in North (1994) and Harry Hamlin in In the Best of Families: Marriage, Pride & Madness (1994).

Kelly McGillis is a member of the following lists: American film actors, American film producers and American television actors.

Kelly Ann McGillis (born July 9, 1957) is an American actress. She is known for her film roles such as Rachel Lapp in Witness (1985), for which she received Golden Globe and BAFTA nominations; Charlie in Top Gun (1986); Made in Heaven (1987); The House on Carroll Street (1988); and as Kathryn Murphy in The Accused (1988). In her later career, she has starred in horror films such as Stake Land (2010), The Innkeepers (2011), and We Are What We Are (2013).
